Package scenegraph

Class AbstLight

  • java.lang.Object
    • scenegraph.AbstSceneObject
      • scenegraph.AbstNode
        • scenegraph.AbstSpatial
          • scenegraph.AbstLight
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, ChannelInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AmbientLight, PointLight
    public abstract class AbstLight
extends AbstSpatial
    Base class for different type of light sources within the scene. At the moment only point light (LT_POINT) is implemented as a concrete class. The ambient, diffuse and specular characteristics of the light, and the constant, linear and quadratic factors of the attenuation formula are stored and get be accessed here.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ursula Derichs

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  AbstLight.lightType
      Light types, currently only LT_POINT and LT_AMBIENT implemented
